name: Fey Disguise
summary: You can disguise yourself with magical illusions.
description:
You can disguise yourself with magical illusions. You can cast illusory disguise once per day as a 1st-level primal innate spell. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.Traits

Sprite: A family of diminutive winged fey with a strong connection to primal magic.
